banner.slogan:
Actions speak louder than words. I enjoy learning anything what I don't know!
My research interest includes data science, program development, Full-Stack, mobile application and IoT

en.aboutme:
I am a keyboard worker dedicated to software, program development and data analytics research.
I am an extremely adaptive and organized person who likes to challenge and self-learning.
I like to learn new things to cultivate different abilities.
When in doubt, I can effectively find ways to solve problems and accumulate my experience.
On the other hand, I am passionate about information technology and hope to make our lives better through information tools and technologies.
en.name: Shun-Bo,Hsu

banner.slogan:
我是一個喜歡實作精進技術的人，我樂於學習、研究任何新事物!
我的研究興趣包含資料科學、程式研發、前後端技術、行動應用程式、物聯網。

zh-tw.aboutme:
我是個致力於新興技術研究的鍵盤工作者

我有清楚的邏輯能力且能夠適應資訊急速成長，喜歡挑戰和自我學習

我喜歡學習新事物來培養不同的能力。
當遇到問題時，能夠有效地找到解決方法並積累經驗。
另一方面，我熱衷於信息技術，希望通過信息工具和技術改善我們的生活。
zh-tw.name: Shun-Bo,Hsu
